name: Umberto Caracappa's La Maschera Mortuaria
description:
It's halloween and you're an evil mask salesperson! In this cute little arcade clicker, you sell lethal halloween masks to children, sacrifice them to your pagan gods, and grow from a creep to a warlock!

  • 22 Mask combinations, can you find Skully and other specialities?
  • Run away from angry parents!
  • Sick tunes by Sebastian Laitila (aarre.itch.io)

Further updates + content quite unlikely (only on request and serious bugs), as this is for the HauntedPS1 Game Jam and something I did for fun. But if you want to find my real games, check out Voltage High Society on Steam
